title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 has a line that uses Class.forName() to instantiate a Callback object.
EB: To resolve this issue, add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class. Since there are no non-static methods in this class, making the constructor private would be a good practice. It would prevent unnecessary instantiation of the class. This change will not add any size to the code as the compiler generates a free public constructor by default.
